title: Has anyone received the counselling fees refund
content: Has anyone gotten the refund of 5,10,000 online counselling fees ? I didnt opt any seat. When i can expect the refund ?

comments.body:
![gif](giphy|qEdbSUizkOx9MWBysO)

Got bad news for you my dude /s
youâ€™ve been posting really funny gifs as answers latelyâ€¦Love em
Yup I got back my fees that i had paid for ece in rr campus

I had a management seat but got in through JEE Quota, they said the excess amount will be refunded automatically, but it was infact not automatic. 

I emailed Kavyashree (admissions office) and she asked for some documents, and later said that the refund would be initiated 

It's been 4 days since i got that email ðŸ’€ still no refund
Whenever I call them, they say a refund will be generated within 10-15 days. Still, I have no idea when the refund will be issued.
I was in ur situation but pessat last year, they gave the excess back in like 3 days

dude what to do now they cant just keep doing this and which number did u call on they arent picking 

up my calls only
Bro any update ? I still didnt get the refund, I contacted them last week through email and they said they will refund in 1 week time.

i went to the campus to get it squared out, they said they'll refund by monday

so i think its like a 2-3 week wait time until they refund
